body:
Good point @F3PiX 👍 

I just added a migration align the past seasons' teams with the current datamodel in #946 , but we're still discussing whether or not it's a good idea to do it. For the sake of keeping the complexity in a sane scope, I'd personally prefer to migrate the existing data and then simply use `accepted` again.

Otherwise yes, looking for activities would be a valid option (plus I'd probably also prefer it to listing all ancient "kinds").
